code: export var convertCurrency=function convertCurrency(number){var formatter=new Intl.NumberFormat("en-EN",{style:"currency",currency:"USD",notation:"compact"});return formatter.format(number);};export var convertCompactNumber=function convertCompactNumber(number){var formatter=new Intl.NumberFormat("en-EN",{notation:"compact"});return formatter.format(number);};export var convertToOneDigit=function convertToOneDigit(number){return Math.round(+number*10)/10;};
